item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 艾伦·凯：预测未来（Predicting The Future） in the user temberature at 2022-05-19T05:35:39
item.description:
in reference to:

在一些数学和科学课程中，他们经常告诉你，最好的方法是改变问题。我认为最好的方法是改变问题陈述的背景。几年前，马文·明斯基说，“你只有通过多种方式才能理解一件事。”（You don’t understand something until you understand it more than one way.）

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How long does it take to master a language like a native speaker? in the user temberature at 2022-09-02T03:10:21
item.description:
in reference to:

I find that memorizing a number of ‘filler’ words or sentences can greatly increase your ability to come off as native, as well as knowing some expressions and sayings. Instead of expressing agreement with a simple ‘yes’ you could try responding with “you know what? I Agree!” or “I think I see what you mean”. It’s agreement either way but it sounds a lot more ‘native’.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated retrieve_pdf_metadata [Zotero Documentation] in the user temberature at 2022-09-04T17:33:59
item.description:
in reference to:

To use this feature, simply drag your existing PDFs into your Zotero library or use the “Store Copy of File” or “Link to File” options from the add new item menu (green plus sign). By default, Zotero will automatically retrieve metadata for each PDF, create an appropriate parent item, and rename the associated file based on the metadata. (You can disable these automatic functions in the General pane of Zotero preferences.)
